page.title: 02BELLINGHAM FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: There are two schools in Bellingham, a{First School}and a{Middle School}in adjoining buildings sharing large attractive{playing fields. Children begin Bellingham First School the year they become five and leave when they are nine years old.The school has seventy{pupils}and three lady{teachers,}one of whom is also the headmistress.At lunch time the children have a school{meal,}a packed lunch or go home. The pupils{learn}reading,writing, mathematics,physical skills,art,craft, music and finding out about the world around them. The school is quite well provided for with two computers,radio,television,a good book selection and much{equipment for games,music and other educational activities.It also has close links with other first schools in the area.
